title: FTP Check
description: A configuration for a check that uses the FTP protocol.

host.description: The IP or hostname of the host to run the FTP check against.

username.description: The user to log in with over FTP

password.description: The password for the user that you wish to log in with.

file.description: The path to a file to read on the FTP server.

contentRegex.description: A regex that the file content must match for the check to pass.

hashContentMatch.description: Whether the file content must match a given hash for the check to pass.

hash.description: A SHA3-256 hash that the file content must match if `hashContentMatch` is set to `true`.

port.description: The TCP port the FTP server should be listening on.

simple.description: Whether simplified FTP behavior should be used. Allows the check to work with very old FTP servers. If set to `true`, the check will only attempt to navigate to the directory specified by the `file` option.
